FUMBLE-MELEE-2-TEXT: You can only take a move action next round.
FUMBLE-MELEE-3-TEXT: Your weapon is stuck in a nearby surface. DC 20 Str check to free it.
FUMBLE-MELEE-4-TEXT: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.
FUMBLE-MELEE-7-TEXT: You take -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.
FUMBLE-MELEE-8-TEXT: You provoke an attack of opportunity from all adjacent opponents.
FUMBLE-MELEE-10-TEXT: You drop your weapon and it lands 1d6 squares away in a random direction.
FUMBLE-MELEE-11-TEXT: Your weapon is destroyed (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Ref negates%). %OBJECT-DAMAGE=Magic weapons use their own save bonus% (Dungeon Master's Guide 214).
FUMBLE-MELEE-12-TEXT: Your weapon takes 1d6 %OBJECT-DAMAGE=points of damage%, ignoring hardness.
FUMBLE-MELEE-14-TEXT: Your target gains possession of your weapon (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Ref negates%).
FUMBLE-MELEE-15-TEXT: Your attack deals %OBJECT-DAMAGE=damage to your shield%.
FUMBLE-MELEE-18-TEXT: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
FUMBLE-MELEE-20-TEXT: You become %STATUS-ENTANGLED=entangled% in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself.
FUMBLE-MELEE-22-TITLE: I told you it was sharp
FUMBLE-MELEE-24-TEXT: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round.
FUMBLE-MELEE-25-TEXT: Your attack hits an ally adjacent to you or the target.
FUMBLE-MELEE-29-TEXT: Your weapon loses reach. You have a -4 penalty on attack rolls with it until repaired (DC 20 Craft check).
FUMBLE-MELEE-30-TEXT: You threaten no square for 1d6 rounds.
FUMBLE-MELEE-32-TEXT: Your weapon flies 2d6 squares in a random direction.
FUMBLE-MELEE-33-TEXT: Your weapon deals %NONLETHAL-DAMAGE=nonlethal damage% for the next 3 rounds.
FUMBLE-MELEE-35-TEXT: Move 10 feet in a random direction provoking attacks of opportunity as normal.
FUMBLE-MELEE-36-TEXT: You fall %STATUS-PRONE=prone% and are %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1d3 rounds (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort negates%).
FUMBLE-MELEE-38-TEXT: All your enemies have concealment from you for 1d4 rounds.
FUMBLE-MELEE-40-TEXT: If you're using a slashing weapon, you take 1d6 points of damage and 1 point of %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.
FUMBLE-MELEE-41-TEXT: If you're using a bludgeoning weapon, you take 1d3 of %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% and drop your weapon.
FUMBLE-MELEE-42-TEXT: Your attack hits the target, but deals minimum damage.
FUMBLE-MELEE-43-TEXT: You drop whatever is in your off hand.
FUMBLE-MELEE-44-TEXT: You take -4 penalty on all attacks with this weapon until it is repaired (DC 20 Craft Check).
FUMBLE-MELEE-45-TEXT: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit.
FUMBLE-MELEE-46-TEXT: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
FUMBLE-MELEE-47-TEXT: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.
FUMBLE-MELEE-49-TEXT: You attack damages you instead. Use your target's Str modifier.
FUMBLE-MELEE-51-TEXT: You take an amount of %STATUS-BLEED=bleed% equal to your Str bonus (minimum 1).
FUMBLE-MELEE-52-TEXT: Your attack deals %OBJECT-DAMAGE=damage to your armor%.
